message: Hello Bob, I'm pleased to offer you this excellent product. Given its value, I believe a starting price of $950,000 is fair.  What do you think?
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $700,000. I believe this is a more reasonable price for the product, considering its value to you is $800,000.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $700,000 is significantly below its true value. I'm willing to negotiate, so how about we meet in the middle at $875,000?
I appreciate your willingness to negotiate, but $875,000 is still a bit steep for me. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so how about we try $825,000?
